parts.text: {"word":"encercler","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"取り囲む、包囲する、囲む","english_definition":"to surround, encircle, enclose","examples":[{"sentence":"Les manifestants ont encerclé le bâtiment du gouvernement.","translation":"デモ隊は政府の建物を囲んだ。"},{"sentence":"La forêt dense encercle le village.","translation":"鬱蒼とした森が村を囲んでいる。"},{"sentence":"Les policiers ont encerclé le suspect.","translation":"警察官は容疑者を取り囲んだ。"}],"collocations":["encercler une ville (都市を包囲する)","encercler un ennemi (敵を包囲する)","être encerclé (包囲される)"],"synonyms":["entourer","investir","circonvenir","bloquer","isoler"],"antonyms":["libérer","dégager","ouvrir"],"related_terms":["cercle (円、輪)","circonférence (円周)","circonscription (管轄区域)"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「en-」（～の中へ、～にする）+ 「cercle」（円、輪）から構成される。ラテン語の「circulus」（小さな円）に由来する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ɑ̃.sɛʁ.kle/","syllables":"en-cer-cler"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"indicative":{"present":{"first_person_singular":"j'encercle","second_person_singular":"tu encercles","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on encercle","first_person_plural":"nous encerclons","second_person_plural":"vous encerclez","third_person_plural":"ils/elles encerclent"},"imperfect":{"first_person_singular":"j'encerclais","second_person_singular":"tu encerclais","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on encerclait","first_person_plural":"nous encerclions","second_person_plural":"vous encercliez","third_person_plural":"ils/elles encerclaient"},"future":{"first_person_singular":"j'encerclerai","second_person_singular":"tu encercleras","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on encerclera","first_person_plural":"nous encerclerons","second_person_plural":"vous encerclerez","third_person_plural":"ils/elles encercleront"},"past_historic":{"first_person_singular":"j'encerclai","second_person_singular":"tu encerclas","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on encercla","first_person_plural":"nous encerclâmes","second_person_plural":"vous encerclâtes","third_person_plural":"ils/elles encerclèrent"},"past_anterior":{"first_person_singular":"j'eus encerclé","second_person_singular":"tu eus encerclé","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on eut encerclé","first_person_plural":"nous eûmes encerclé","second_person_plural":"vous eûtes encerclé","third_person_plural":"ils/elles eurent encerclé"},"future_anterior":{"first_person_singular":"j'aurai encerclé","second_person_singular":"tu auras encerclé","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on aura encerclé","first_person_plural":"nous aurons encerclé","second_person_plural":"vous aurez encerclé","third_person_plural":"ils/elles auront encerclé","third_person_singular":"il/elle/on aurait encerclé","first_person_plural":"nous aurions encerclé","second_person_plural":"vous auriez encerclé","third_person_plural":"ils/elles auraient encerclé"}}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"first_person_singular":"que j'encercle","second_person_singular":"que tu encercles","third_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on encercle","first_person_plural":"que nous encerclions","second_person_plural":"que vous encercliez","third_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles encerclent"},"imperfect":{"first_person_singular":"que j'encerclasse","second_person_singular":"que tu enserclasses","third_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on enserclât","first_person_plural":"que nous enserclassions","second_person_plural":"que vous enserclassiez","third_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles enserclassent"},"past":{"first_person_singular":"que j'aie encerclé","second_person_singular":"que tu aies encerclé","third_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on ait encerclé","first_person_plural":"que nous ayons encerclé","second_person_plural":"que vous ayez encerclé","third_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles aient encerclé"},"pluperfect":{"first_person_singular":"que j'eusse encerclé","second_person_singular":"que tu eusses encerclé","third_person_singular":"qu'il/elle/on eût encerclé","first_person_plural":"que nous eussions encerclé","second_person_plural":"que vous eussiez encerclé","third_person_plural":"qu'ils/elles eussent encerclé"}}},"imperative":{"present":{"second_person_singular":"encercle","first_person_plural":"encerclons","second_person_plural":"encerclez"},"past":{"second_person_singular":"aie encerclé","first_person_plural":"ayons encerclé","second_person_plural":"ayez encerclé"}},"infinitive":{"present":"encercler","past":"avoir encerclé"},"participle":{"present":"encerclant","past":"encerclé","gerund":"en en cerclant"}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**encercler**」は、物理的に何かを囲むだけでなく、比喩的に孤立させる、制限するといった意味合いでも使われます。軍事的な状況で敵を包囲する、デモ隊が建物を囲む、といった具体的な状況から、抽象的な概念まで幅広く使用されます。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"J'ai encerclé par la police.","correct":"J'ai été encerclé par la police.","note":"「encercler」は他動詞なので、受動態で使う場合は「être」が必要です。"},{"incorrect":"Les montagnes entourent la ville, ils l'encerclent.","correct":"Les montagnes entourent la ville, elles l'encerclent.","note":"「montagnes」は女性複数形なので、代名詞は「elles」を使用します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["encerclement (名詞: 包囲、取り囲み)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_lexique_fr":"中頻度 (Medium frequency)","priority":"★★☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**encercler**」は、何かを物理的に囲む、包囲するという意味の動詞です。軍事的な文脈で敵を包囲する状況や、デモ隊が建物を囲む状況などで使われます。比喩的に、人を孤立させたり、制限したりする意味合いでも使われます。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Les troupes rebelles ont tenté d'**encercler** la capitale.","translation":"反乱軍は首都を包囲しようとした。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"包囲する"},{"sentence":"Le jardin est **encerclé** d'une haute haie.","translation":"庭は高い生垣で囲まれている。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"囲む"},{"sentence":"Il se sentait **encerclé** par les problèmes.","translation":"彼は問題に囲まれているように感じた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"比喩的な意味：取り囲む"}]}
